name: Human-Computer Interaction
description: The course will provide an introduction to the field of Human-Computer Interaction (HCI) with emphasis on guidelines, principles, methodologies, and tools and techniques for analyzing, designing and evaluating user interfaces. Subsequent topics include usability assessment of interactive systems, prototyping tools, information search and visualization, mobile devices, social media and social networking, and accessibility factors.
prerequisites: CSCB07H3 and [CGPA 3.0 or enrolment in a CSC Subject POSt]
